title: A Real Cowboy Never Says No
description: Alternate cover edition for ASIN B00XS0Q65CNew York Times bestselling author Stephanie Rowe delivers another winner when a marriage of convenience is the only way for a rugged cowboy to protect the unborn baby of his late best friend. "OH. MY. GOSH! This was the best book I've read in a really, really long time." ~jenny7 (Amazon Review)Mira Cabot has always wanted a family, and now she has the chance…but being on the run while she's pregnant, broke, and single wasn't exactly how she'd envisioned it. When a distractingly handsome cowboy offers her a marriage of convenience, it's the lifeline she needs…and one that no modern-day woman would ever accept…right?Rancher Chase Stockton trusts no one except his brothers and his late best friend…who left behind a baby on the way. Chase knows who will come after that baby, and the only way he can protect it is to give the child…and its mother…his name. When Mira arrives in Wyoming to be the bride of a cowboy she's met only once, neither of them expect to find the love that has always eluded them…the love they both so desperately yearn for.
author: Stephanie Rowe
